title: LensSettings
description: This element holds the Setting applied to a Lens used in the Light Path during the acquisition of this Channel as well as a reference (the ID attribute) to the Lens in question.

subCategoriesOrder.LensSettings: This element holds the Setting applied to a Lens used in the Light Path during the acquisition of this Channel as well as a reference (the ID attribute) to the Lens in question.

ID.description: This is the Unique Identifier of the device used in this case.

Function.description: This field records the purpose for which this Additinal Lens was used during the Acquisition of this Channel.

Tier.description: The tier level of this component.
